typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		{Unnamed: 0} as string,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		DayofMonth as integer,
		DayOfWeek as integer,
		DepTime as integer,
		CRSDepTime as string,
		ArrTime as integer,
		CRSArrTime as integer,
		UniqueCarrier as string,
		FlightNum as string,
		TailNum as string,
		ActualElapsedTime as string,
		CRSElapsedTime as string,
		AirTime as string,
		ArrDelay as string,
		DepDelay as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		Distance as string,
		TaxiIn as string,
		TaxiOut as string,
		Cancelled as string,
		CancellationCode as string,
		Diverted as string,
		CarrierDelay as string,
		WeatherDelay as string,
		NASDelay as string,
		SecurityDelay as string,
		LateAircraftDelay as string,
		Date as date 'dd/MM/yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'origin',
	wildcardPaths:['General/DIPS/A/*/*/*']) ~> ReadCSVs
ReadCSVs select(mapColumn(
		Prop_0,
		{Unnamed: 0},
		Year,
		Month,
		DayofMonth,
		DayOfWeek,
		DepTime,
		CRSDepTime,
		ArrTime,
		CRSArrTime,
		UniqueCarrier,
		FlightNum,
		TailNum,
		ActualElapsedTime,
		CRSElapsedTime,
		AirTime,
		ArrDelay,
		DepDelay,
		Origin = ReadCSVs@Origin,
		Dest,
		Distance,
		TaxiIn,
		TaxiOut,
		Cancelled,
		CancellationCode,
		Diverted,
		CarrierDelay,
		WeatherDelay,
		NASDelay,
		SecurityDelay,
		LateAircraftDelay,
		Date,
		origin = ReadCSVs@origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropIrrelevantColumns
DropIrrelevantColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
